content: apple blossom stole by kai mistry with the end of winter comes the beginning of spring my most treasured memories of spring are of apple tress in the school playground blossoming informing you that summer is just round the corner and the apples would be plentiful this stole reminds me lying beneath the trees and seeing the sunlight filter through the leaves and blossom viewed through half-closed eyes s ize stole measures 195 x 58 cm 78 x 23 inches after blocking s y uggested arn yarn 1 skein natural dye studio alpaca lace 549m/100g in colour venus h ooks 4mm/g n otions row counter t ension 2 x 2 motifs = 9cm/3 5inches x 8cm/3 14inches after blocking p n attern otes this stole is worked in two halves with the second half being worked up from the cast on of the first half the trellis pattern is worked over a multiple of 2 + 6 sts and the lace pattern over a multiple of 8 + 9 add or subtract pattern repeats if you choose to alter the width of the stole a bbreviations please note english terms and abbreviations are used in this pattern chain s -
